amendment.description: An amendment to provide for States to require all individuals enrolled in an academy of a law enforcement agency of the State and all law enforcement officers of the State fulfill a training session on sensitivity each fiscal year, including training on ethnic and racial bias, cultural diversity, and police interaction with the disabled, mentally ill, and new immigrants.

action.text: By unanimous consent, the Lee amendment was withdrawn.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A047) offered by Ms. Lee.
